comments.comment:
matplotlib reads the MPLBACKEND environment var at import time, and it's being imported before bootstrap has a chance to run and update os.environ["MPLBACKEND"]: <denchmark-code>(Pdb) w /Users/tim/.local/share/virtualenvs/lib-CDRh8goq/bin/streamlit(11)<module>() -> load_entry_point('streamlit', 'console_scripts', 'streamlit')() /Users/tim/.local/share/virtualenvs/lib-CDRh8goq/lib/python3.7/site-packages/pkg_resources/__init__.py(489)load_entry_point() -> return get_distribution(dist).load_entry_point(group, name) /Users/tim/.local/share/virtualenvs/lib-CDRh8goq/lib/python3.7/site-packages/pkg_resources/__init__.py(2852)load_entry_point() -> return ep.load() /Users/tim/.local/share/virtualenvs/lib-CDRh8goq/lib/python3.7/site-packages/pkg_resources/__init__.py(2443)load() -> return self.resolve() /Users/tim/.local/share/virtualenvs/lib-CDRh8goq/lib/python3.7/site-packages/pkg_resources/__init__.py(2449)resolve() -> module = __import__(self.module_name, fromlist=['__name__'], level=0) <frozen importlib._bootstrap>(983)_find_and_load() <frozen importlib._bootstrap>(953)_find_and_load_unlocked() <frozen importlib._bootstrap>(219)_call_with_frames_removed() <frozen importlib._bootstrap>(983)_find_and_load() <frozen importlib._bootstrap>(967)_find_and_load_unlocked() <frozen importlib._bootstrap>(677)_load_unlocked() <frozen importlib._bootstrap_external>(728)exec_module() <frozen importlib._bootstrap>(219)_call_with_frames_removed() /export/streamlit/lib/streamlit/__init__.py(96)<module>() -> from streamlit.DeltaGenerator import DeltaGenerator as _DeltaGenerator <frozen importlib._bootstrap>(983)_find_and_load() <frozen importlib._bootstrap>(967)_find_and_load_unlocked() <frozen importlib._bootstrap>(677)_load_unlocked() <frozen importlib._bootstrap_external>(728)exec_module() <frozen importlib._bootstrap>(219)_call_with_frames_removed() /export/streamlit/lib/streamlit/DeltaGenerator.py(29)<module>() -> import pandas as pd
... snip a bunch of stuff that ends with pandas importing matplotlib ... </denchmark-code>
streamlit __init__.py is importing DeltaGenerator which is importing pandas which is importing matplotlib. So, one fix would be to do the environment variable patch in init.py - but then it would happen regardless of whether youâ€™re running from within streamlit or not. Alternately I wonder if we can wrap the streamlit entry point to set the env before any of streamlit is imported (this feels less fragile)
